metadata.title: CVE-2024-35947 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: dyndbg:fix old BUG_ON in >control parser Fix a BUG_ON from 2009. Even if it looks"unreachable" (I didn't really look), lets make sure by removing it, doingpr_err and return -EINVAL instead.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
